security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only Turborepo configuration templates and best practices. All 55 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES - the scanner incorrectly flagged markdown code block delimiters as shell backticks, cache hash references as cryptographic algorithms, and standard Turborepo config patterns as credential access. No executable code, scripts, or malicious patterns exist in this skill.

content.user_title: Optimize Turborepo caching for faster builds
content.value_statement: Slow monorepo builds waste developer time and CI minutes. This skill provides clear Turborepo caching and pipeline configuration templates to speed up your builds and reduce CI costs.
actual_capabilities: Provide turbo.json pipeline templates with outputs and inputs configuration
Outline package-specific turbo.json overrides for different applications
Describe Vercel remote cache login and CI environment variable setup
Show self-hosted remote cache server implementation example
List filter and scope commands for targeted builds in monorepos
Share cache debugging commands and diagnostic flags for troubleshooting
limitations: Does not run Turborepo commands or validate your repository configuration
Does not create or manage Vercel authentication tokens or credentials
Does not deploy or configure the self-hosted cache server for you
Does not resolve project-specific build failures or errors

use_cases.title: Accelerate CI builds
use_cases.description: Tune pipelines and filters to reduce CI time while maintaining correct dependency chains.

use_cases.title: Improve monorepo builds
use_cases.description: Set cache outputs and inputs for web applications to minimize unnecessary rebuilds.

use_cases.title: Enable remote caching
use_cases.description: Configure Vercel or self-hosted cache for shared build artifacts across teams.

prompt_templates.title: Start caching
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a basic turbo.json with build, test, lint, and dev tasks for apps and packages in my monorepo.

prompt_templates.title: CI optimization
prompt_templates.prompt: Suggest CI pipeline steps and package filters to build only affected packages since the main branch.

prompt_templates.title: Remote cache
prompt_templates.prompt: Explain how to enable Vercel remote caching and list the required environment variables for CI.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced inputs
prompt_templates.prompt: Refine the inputs and outputs configuration for a Next.js app to reduce cache invalidation.

output_examples.input: Help me tune turbo.json for a Next.js app and a shared UI package.
output: Define build outputs for .next and dist folders to cache compiled assets
Set inputs to src, tests, and config files only to minimize cache keys
Keep dev task as persistent and uncached since it runs continuously
Add dependsOn to ensure UI package builds before the Next.js app

output_examples.input: Set up remote caching for our team with Vercel.
output: Run npx turbo login to authenticate with Vercel
Run npx turbo link to connect your project
Add TURBO_TOKEN and TURBO_TEAM environment variables to CI
Use turbo build --remote-only in CI for full remote caching

output_examples.input: Debug why my build cache keeps invalidating.
output: Run turbo build --summarize to see cache hit/miss status
Check that inputs exclude unnecessary files like markdown
Verify globalDependencies only include truly shared files

best_practices: Define explicit inputs and outputs for accurate cache key generation and fewer misses
Enable remote caching for consistency between CI and local development environments
Use package filters to limit builds to only affected packages in CI pipelines
anti_patterns: Caching dev servers or long-running persistent tasks that never terminate
Including secrets or sensitive values in cached environment variable configurations
Over-filtering packages and missing critical dependency builds in your pipeline

faq.question: Which environments are supported?
faq.answer: It works with Turborepo projects on local machines and all major CI runners like GitHub Actions.

faq.question: Are there limits on project size?
faq.answer: There are no hard limits, but very large repositories need careful inputs and outputs configuration.

faq.question: Can it integrate with Vercel remote cache?
faq.answer: Yes, it provides guidance for login, linking projects, and setting required CI variables for Vercel.

faq.question: Does it access or store my data?
faq.answer: No, it is a documentation skill that does not read files, credentials, or send data anywhere.

faq.question: What if caching does not work as expected?
faq.answer: Use the debug and summarize flags to inspect cache hits, misses, and hash calculations.

faq.question: How does it compare to other monorepo tools?
faq.answer: This skill focuses specifically on Turborepo caching patterns, not comparisons with Nx or Lerna.
